xmp_property.name: seriesTitle
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/seriesTitle_description=(*Required) The final title of a grouping of publishable assets with sharing identification and branding linked by common characters, subject matter, style or story.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/seriesTitle_label=Series Title *

xmp_property.name: programmeTitle
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/programmeTitle_description=(*Required) The title of a Programme Version for a specific purpose.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/programmeTitle_label=Programme Title *

xmp_property.name: episodeTitleNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/episodeTitleNumber_description=(*Required) Final episode name and or number used to identify an individual episode.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/episodeTitleNumber_label=Episode Title/Number *

xmp_property.name: shimName
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/shimName_description=The name of the AS-11 shim specification to which the associated MXF file conforms.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/shimName_label=Shim Name

xmp_property.name: shimVersion
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/shimVersion_description=The version of the AS-11 shim specification to which the associated MXF file conforms.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/shimVersion_label=Shim Version

xmp_property.name: audioTrackLayout
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/audioTrackLayout_description=(*Required) The set of permissible EBU R 48 and EBU R 123 track allocation names.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/audioTrackLayout_label=Audio Track Layout *

xmp_property.name: primaryAudioLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/primaryAudioLanguage_description=(*Required) Primary audio language used in the Programme Version.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/primaryAudioLanguage_label=Primary Audio Language *

xmp_property.name: closedCaptionsPresent
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsPresent_description=(*Required) This status is to be set if the delivered programme contains any embedded (out of vision) subtitling information for the hard of hearing.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsPresent_label=Closed Captions Present *

xmp_property.name: closedCaptionsType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsType_description=This describes the editorial description of the out of vision subtitling employed within the delivered programme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsType_label=Closed Captions Type

xmp_property.name: closedCaptionsLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsLanguage_description=This describes the primary language of the embedded subtitle data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11c/closedCaptionsLanguage_label=Closed Captions Language
